popt4jlib

Interface SubjectIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread, DFA, DGA, DGABH, DPSO, GLockingObservableObserverBase

    public interface SubjectIntf
    The SubjectIntf implements the Subject Object's methods in the well-known Observer Design Pattern. Also known as the Observable part of the pattern. See the comments in the ObserverIntf class.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addIncumbent(ObserverIntf obs, java.lang.Object soln)
      add back a new solution produced by the obs Observer
      FunctionIntf getFunction()
      return the function associated with this subject.
      java.lang.Object getIncumbent()
      return the best solution found so far by this subject.
      java.util.HashMap getParams()
      returns the parameters associated with this subject.
      void notifyObservers()
      calls the method notifyChange(x) for each of the registered observers of this subject.
      boolean registerObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      registers an observer to listen to changes to this subject
      boolean removeObserver(ObserverIntf o)
      removes an observer from this subject's registered observers
